channel.title: Can someone help me? please il rep+
channel.description: can you help me? i dont want to add a new skill but i was just wondering how can i make for example how can i make a goblin give me herblore xp if i kill him is that possible? please tell me how.. for example i kill a goblin and i receive 100xp of herblore.. please help me! i will rep+

item.title: Can someone help me? please il rep+
item.dc:creator: @mmiillkkaa mmiillkkaa
item.description:
@mmiillkkaa wrote:

I’ll take a guess, change this to something that may work:

If(npcKilled == goblinidgoeshere) {
addSkillExp[amount of exp, skill id];
}

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone help me? please il rep+
